summary: A fast test suite that validates the core functionality of the PixArtSigma pipeline with Prompt-Aware Guidance (PAG), checking component integration, attention slicing behavior, output format consistency, inference parity between batch and single inputs, PAG layer application and toggling, as well as model checkpoint saving and loading.
business_intent: Guarantee the reliability and correctness of the PixArtSigma PAG pipeline for rapid development, deployment, and maintenance by providing comprehensive automated verification of its critical features.
